## Highlighted Software

::: {.grid}
::: {.g-col-6}
![](images/clustRviz_software.png)
[**clustRviz**](https://github.com/DataSlingers/clustRviz) enables fast computation and easy visualization of convex clustering and biclustering solution paths.
:::
::: {.g-col-6}
![](images/tcga2stat_software.png)
[**TCGA2STAT**](https://liuzlab.org/TCGA2STAT/) allows users to easily download The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) data directly into a format ready for integrative statistical analysis in R or Python. 
:::
:::
